body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.28.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#812](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/812) Use apicurio-data-models instead of io.apicurio.hub.core.beans.OpenApiDocument et al
* [#811](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/811) Editor: bulleted lists not displaying properly in markdown controls
* [#806](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/806) Pet example template has wrong OperationID
* [#805](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/805) Deprecated all of the oai-ts-* npm libraries, replaced by apicurio-data-models
* [#804](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/804) Validation - Form Data params cause a validation problem even when Consumes is properly set
* [#803](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/803) Example Generator does not work with enums
* [#802](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/802) JSON formatting changes
* [#797](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/797) GitHub linking error
* [#796](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/796) Cannot publish and collaborate when share for everyone mode is active
* [#794](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/794) An api project cannot be copied while Chinese character exists in the api document
* [#793](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/793) How to create cookie parameters for openapi 3.0.2?
* [#791](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/791) Apicurio will response a bit slowly when the open api file is large, such as 2M
* [#790](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/790) Not all tags can be displayed
* [#789](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/789) Chinese character is not supported in name when creating non-blank API through UI
* [#788](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/788) Importing large file (4M) will cause unexpected server error
* [#787](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/787) '-' is not supported in path parameter -- openapi: 3.0.2
* [#785](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/785) Warning "Schema items must be present only for schemas of type 'array' " is promoted when adding a parameter through UI -- openapi: 3.0.2
* [#784](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/784) encoding request body with utf8 when commit to gitlab
* [#783](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/783) Self-hosted gitlab publish occur script error.
* [#779](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/779) API spec include Korean not transfer microcks
* [#776](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/776) Error trying to publish someone else's API Design
* [#734](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/734) Specifiy 'Type Enum As ...' through UI
* [#693](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/693) Editor: When creating a Data Type, convert example to js object when possible
* [#689](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/689) Editor: Validation warning missing when switching from Basic to API Key for a Security Scheme
* [#570](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/570) Editor: Creating paths from Data Type when the data type name is non-standard
* [#565](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/565) Editor: When inserting <HTML> code block, the editor will interpret it and behave incorrectly
* [#553](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/553) Editor: Need better handling of long API names


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.28
